mapper.select: SELECT P.PAY_NO, P.PAY_DATE, PA.PA_TITLE, PA.PA_NO, M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NAME, M.MEM_NICKNAME, PA.PA_NAME, M2.MEM_NICKNAME AS PA_NICKNAME, O.OTT_NAME, P.PAYMENT, P.PRICE, PA.ACCOUNT, P.REMIT_STATUS FROM PAY P LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (P.PAY_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN PARTY PA ON (P.PA_NO = PA.PA_NO) LEFT JOIN OTT O ON (O.OTT_NO = PA.OTT_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (PA.PA_NAME = M2.MEM_NO) ORDER BY P.PAY_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEPOSIT(DEP_NO, PA_NO, REC_NO, SEND_NO, DEP_PRICE) VALUES(SEQ_DEP.NEXTVAL, #{paNo}, #{recNo}, #{sendNo}, #{depPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PAY_NO, P.PAY_MEM_NO, P.PAY_DATE, PA.PA_TITLE, O.OTT_NAME, P.PAYMENT, P.PRICE FROM PAY P LEFT JOIN PARTY PA ON (P.PA_NO = PA.PA_NO) LEFT JOIN OTT O ON (O.OTT_NO = PA.OTT_NO) WHERE P.PAY_MEM_NO = #{payMemNo} ORDER BY P.PAY_NO DESC
